languages.text: {n}Печально улыбнувшись, Джай кивает.{/n} "Я понимаю. Прости, что обманула твое доверие. И спасибо, что позволял{mf||а} обманывать тебя так долго".
{n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."
languages.original_text: {n}Печально улыбнувшись, Джай кивает.{/n} "Я понимаю. Прости, что обманула твое доверие. И спасибо, что позволял{mf||а} обманывать тебя так долго".

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa triste, Jae asiente.{/n} «Lo entiendo. Siento haber traicionado su confianza con mis mentiras y le agradezco que me haya dejado engañarle tanto tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa triste, Jae asiente.{/n} «Lo entiendo. Siento haber traicionado su confianza con mis mentiras y le agradezco que me haya dejado engañarle tanto tiempo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊悲伤地笑着，点了点头。{/n}“我明白。我很抱歉欺骗了你，辜负了你的信任。谢谢你容忍我骗了你这么久。”
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊悲伤地笑着，点了点头。{/n}“我明白。我很抱歉欺骗了你，辜负了你的信任。谢谢你容忍我骗了你这么久。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}悲しそうに微笑みながら、ジェイはうなずく。{/n}「そうだね。騙してあんたの信頼を裏切るようなことをしてごめん。それからこんなに長い間、騙されてくれてありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}悲しそうに微笑みながら、ジェイはうなずく。{/n}「そうだね。騙してあんたの信頼を裏切るようなことをしてごめん。それからこんなに長い間、騙されてくれてありがとう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae acquiesce avec un sourire triste.{/n} « Je comprends. Je suis navrée d'avoir trahi votre confiance et je vous remercie de m'avoir laissée jouer la comédie aussi longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae acquiesce avec un sourire triste.{/n} « Je comprends. Je suis navrée d'avoir trahi votre confiance et je vous remercie de m'avoir laissée jouer la comédie aussi longtemps. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt traurig und nickt.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Es tut mir leid, dass ich Euer Vertrauen missbraucht habe, indem ich Euch getäuscht habe. Und danke, dass Ihr mir so lange gestattet habt, Euch zu täuschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lächelt traurig und nickt.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Es tut mir leid, dass ich Euer Vertrauen missbraucht habe, indem ich Euch getäuscht habe. Und danke, dass Ihr mir so lange gestattet habt, Euch zu täuschen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

languages.text: {n}Jae, hüzünlü bir şekilde gülümseyip başını eğiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Seni kandırarak bana duyduğun güveni boşa çıkardığım için üzgünüm. Seni bunca zamandır kandırmama müsaade ettiğin içinse teşekkürler."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling sadly, Jae nods.{/n} "I understand. I'm sorry I betrayed your trust by deceiving you. And thank you for letting me deceive you for so long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hüzünlü bir şekilde gülümsüyor ve başını eğiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Seni kandırarak bana duyduğun güveni boşa çıkardığım için üzgünüm. Seni bu kadar uzun süre kandırmama izin verdiğin içinse teşekkürler."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
